Title: CSE 500/490B -- Useful References
Body: Books on Reserve in the Engineering Library These have been requested, but aren't yet on the reserve shelves: James Brook and Iain A. Boal (editors), Resisting the Virtual Life: The Culture and Politics of Information Bill Gates, The Road Ahead Steven Miller, Civilizing Cyberspace , ACM Press/Addison-Wesley, 1996 (text for the course) Nicholas Negroponte, Being Digital Jorge Reina Schement and Terry Curtis, Tendencies and Tensions of the Information Age: The Production and Distribution of Information in the United States
